content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of this statement?

choices.label: It prints five lines of text, each separated by a line break indicated by the escape sequence \n.
It prints four lines of text because the escape sequence \n appears four times in the string literal.
It prints one line of text because the printed value is a single string literal.
It prints nothing due to a syntax error.

content.answer: It prints five lines of text, each separated by a line break indicated by the escape sequence \n.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
